CSSStyleDeclarationItem.summary:
The CSSStyleDeclaration.item()
method interface returns a CSS property name from a
by index.

remarks.para:
This method doesn't throw exceptions as long as you provide
arguments; the empty string is returned if the index is out of range and a
is thrown if no argument is provided.

CSSStyleDeclarationItem.returns: A string that is the name of the CSS property at the specified index.JavaScript has a special simpler syntax for obtaining an item from a NodeList by index:
